TapTap.changelog:
# 1.1.6
* Ignore messages you cannot reply to

# 1.1.4
* Optionally reply to own messages instead of editing them

# 1.1.3
* Select the input box if opening keyboard

# 1.1.0
* Automatically open keyboard when replying to a message. Disabled by default, toggleable via settings

DedicatedPluginSettings.changelog:
# 1.1.4
* Make entries reorderable via drag & drop
* Add reset button

# 1.1.3
* Fix a small bug I missed

# 1.1.2
* Plugin section is now a dropdown that you can open/close
* New Customize Option: You can now hide plugins from the list

# 1.1.0
* Add more icons

# 1.0.5
* Fix crash when changing device orientation

# 1.0.4
* Improve implementation

BetterSpotify.changelog:
# 1.1.4
* Remove spotify embeds. They are now part of my new plugin PlayableEmbeds, which also adds playable youtube embeds.

# 1.1.2
* Make spotify embeds scrollable <:blobcatcozy:859801776232202280> 

# 1.1.0
* add sendSpotifySong and sendSpotifyAlbum commands
* add rich spotify embeds with play button like on desktop

Themer.changelog:
# 3.6.2
* Now prompts to switch to dark mode if using light/pureEvil theme

# 3.6.1
* Re-enabled custom fonts. They may still be unstable, so use at your own risk

MessageLinkEmbeds.changelog:
# 1.4.3
* Ignore <escaped> message links

# 1.4.2
* Hopefully fix duplicate embeds

# 1.4.0
* Add support for files & embed fields

# 1.3.0
* Make message links jump directly in Discord instead of being launched like regular URLs

PlayableEmbeds.changelog:
# 1.0.1
* Now properly embeds Youtube shorts
* Now no longer resets embeds when someone reacts
* Adds 72 new bugs

EmojiUtility.changelog:
# 1.2.0
* You can now view or download reaction emojis by opening the Reaction Sheet and long pressing the desired emoji

TextFilePreview.changelog:
# 1.0.1
* Reduce default preview size to 300 and add a setting for it
* Add close button that will hide the preview
* Add copy button that will copy the file content to your clipboard
